Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public abstract class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Author:
Hamza Yousaf The Abstract Class for AppointmentDAO. This handles database queries related to appointments.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentDAO

      public AppointmentDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all appointments from the database for display in the main appointment view. This method executes a database query to fetch all columns from the appointments table, and joins with the contacts table to include the contact's name.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing Appointment objects, each representing an appointment record.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error in executing the query.

    • getAppointmentsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByMonth() throws SQLException
      Retrieves appointments for the main appointment view, filtered to include only those occurring in the current month. This method performs a database query similar to getAppointments, but it specifically filters records based on the current month and year. The SQL query utilizes the current date to filter and retrieve relevant appointments.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing Appointment objects for the current month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error in executing the query.

    • getAppointmentsByWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByWeek() throws SQLException
      Retrieves appointments for the main appointment view, specifically filtering for those occurring in the upcoming week. This method performs a database query similar to getAppointments but narrows the results to appointments between the current date and the date seven days from now. The SQL query uses the current date and a date seven days in the future as parameters to identify relevant appointments within the next week.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing Appointment objects scheduled within the next seven days.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error in executing the query.

    • insertAppointment

      public static void insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp tsStart, Timestamp tsEnd, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new appointment into the database using the provided parameters. This method collects user input from the AddAppointment view and constructs an INSERT SQL statement to add the appointment details to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the appointment, entered by the user.
      description - The detailed description of the appointment.
      location - The location for the appointment, selected from a combo box.
      type - The type of the appointment, chosen from a predefined list.
      tsStart - The timestamp representing the start time of the appointment.
      tsEnd - The timestamp representing the end time of the appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with this appointment.
      userId - The ID of the user or employee who is handling the appointment.
      contactId - The ID of the contact associated with the appointment, derived from the contact name selection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the INSERT statement in the database.

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp tsStart, Timestamp tsEnd, int customerId, int userId, int contactId, int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing appointment in the database using the provided parameters. This method collects user input from the UpdateAppointment view and constructs an UPDATE SQL statement to modify the appointment details.
      Parameters:
      title - The updated title for the appointment, entered in the titleTextfield.
      description - The updated description, entered in the descriptionTextField.
      location - The updated location, selected from the locationComboBox.
      type - The updated appointment type, chosen from the typeComboBox.
      tsStart - The timestamp for the updated start time of the appointment.
      tsEnd - The timestamp for the updated end time of the appointment.
      customerId - The updated customer ID, selected from the customerIdComboBox.
      userId - The updated user ID, selected from the userIdComboBox.
      contactId - The updated contact ID, derived from the contact name selected in the contactComboBox.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment being updated, initially collected when the user selects an appointment and displayed in the appointmentIdTextfield (cannot be changed by the user).
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the UPDATE statement in the database.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a selected appointment from the database. This method uses the appointmentId of the chosen appointment to execute a DELETE SQL statement, removing the specified appointment record.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be deleted. This ID is obtained from the appointment selected in the appointment TableView and is used to specify which appointment to remove from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the DELETE statement in the database.

    • checkAppointment

      public static Appointment checkAppointment(LocalDateTime nowLDT) throws SQLException
      Checks for any appointments scheduled to start within 15 minutes of the user's login time. This method is typically called upon successful user login to alert them of imminent appointments.
      Parameters:
      nowLDT - The LocalDateTime of the user's login, used to query the database for appointments starting within 15 minutes of this time.
      Returns:
      An Appointment object if there is an appointment within the next 15 minutes; otherwise, returns an appointment with default values (effectively a null appointment).
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.

    • checkAppointmentOverlap

      public static String checkAppointmentOverlap(LocalDateTime startLDT, LocalDateTime endLDT, int customerId) throws SQLException
      Checks for overlapping appointments for a specified customer. This method is used to prevent scheduling conflicts during appointment creation. It queries the database to find any existing appointments that overlap with the proposed new appointment times.
      Parameters:
      startLDT - The proposed start time of the new appointment.
      endLDT - The proposed end time of the new appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer for whom the overlap check is being performed.
      Returns:
      A descriptive string of any overlapping appointment found; returns "No" if no overlap is detected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.

    • checkUpdateAppointmentOverlap

      public static String checkUpdateAppointmentOverlap(LocalDateTime startLDT, LocalDateTime endLDT, int customerId, int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Checks for overlapping appointments for a specified customer, excluding the appointment being updated. This method is used during the update process to ensure the new times do not conflict with other existing appointments, except the one being updated. It queries the database for any overlapping appointments considering the updated times, omitting the current appointment.
      Parameters:
      startLDT - The proposed new start time for the appointment being updated.
      endLDT - The proposed new end time for the appointment being updated.
      customerId - The ID of the customer for whom the overlap check is being performed.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment being updated, to be excluded from the overlap check.
      Returns:
      A descriptive string of any overlapping appointment found; returns "No" if no overlap is detected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.

    • getMonthTypeReport

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthTypeReport(String month, String type) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a count of appointments based on a specified month and type for reporting purposes. This method queries the database and generates a report of appointments by month and type.
      Parameters:
      month - The month as a string, selected from the month combo box, used in the database query.
      type - The type of appointment, selected from the type combo box, used in the database query.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Appointment objects, each containing month, type, and their count for the report.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.

    • getContactReport

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getContactReport(String contactNameBox) throws SQLException
      Queries the database to generate a report of appointments for a specific contact. The method fetches all appointments associated with the selected contact name.
      Parameters:
      contactNameBox - The name of the contact, obtained from the contact combo box, used to filter appointments.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Appointments associated with the given contact.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.

    • getLocationReport

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getLocationReport(String locationFromBox) throws SQLException
      Queries the database to generate a report of appointments for a specific location. The method fetches all appointments associated with the selected location.
      Parameters:
      locationFromBox - The location, obtained from the location combo box, used to filter appointments.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Appointments associated with the given location.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue executing the query in the database.
